short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This will make SSRS reports visible in Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension fixes a a known issue with how the report is rendered in the browser. SSRS reports were designed to be viewed in Microsoft products, so this issue is due to Chrome rendering a certain style attribute differently than Internet Explorer.
